title: Brat Camp Book 1: Step Daddy's Fertile Forced Dark Fantasy
description: I'm a week away from graduating college and heading to Europe for the next month, at the top of my game--when my stepdaddy decides I need to be taught a hard, unavoidable lesson about life.When I'm out for a run, his little princess gets kidnapped and stepdaddy teaches me vital lessons about being his property at his abandoned hunting cabin.After one long agonizing night of lessons, neither of us will be the same again. Content is for 18+, intense kidnapping roleplay, CNC, and BDSM elements. This is a dark, intense read, if that's not your cup of tea, tread with caution.
author: Elena K. Salvatore
